item.description:
Adrenaline Rush: The Science of Risk features spectacular footage of extreme skydiving while educating audiences on the biology of risk-taking and the physics of human flight. You will see skydivers initiating jumps from aircraft miles above the Florida Keys and the Mojave desert, as also teams of jumpers leaping off treacherous cliffs and mountains in the sport of base jumping.

But perhaps most importantly, it's FREE!

Please don't be late because you can be sure we'll need to wait in a rather long line to get our tickets.

More: http://mos.org/exhibi...
Cost: None
item.how_to_find_us: Let's meet at the ticket counters. My number: 917-362-9790
item.name: Adrenaline Rush (on IMAX)
